meanings.definition: Capable of being diffused or spread out
meanings.sent1: The perfume was diffusible, filling the room with its pleasant scent.
meanings.sent2: The ink was diffusible, spreading quickly across the paper.
meanings.sent3: The diffusible sunlight danced through the curtains, creating a beautiful pattern on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was diffusible, infecting everyone in the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The diffusible colors of the sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking display.

meanings.definition: Able to pass through a membrane or barrier
meanings.sent1: The small molecules were diffusible, easily passing through the cell membrane.
meanings.sent2: Water is diffusible, allowing it to move freely across cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The secret code was diffusible, sneaking through the security system undetected.
meanings.sent4: His words were diffusible, breaking through her emotional barriers.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh bread was diffusible, wafting through the bakery and enticing customers.

meanings.sent1: The confetti was diffusible, spreading all over the party floor.
meanings.sent2: The seeds were diffusible, carried by the wind to different parts of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The bubbles were diffusible, floating in the air like tiny transparent balloons.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were diffusible, wandering aimlessly in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The rumors were diffusible, quickly spreading through the small town.
